name: ANSIBLE
description: Taking a camping trip with girlfriend Emily, Joe thought this would be just another ordinary camping trip. But what he unearths there will change him and you forever. This 4th wall breaking Sci-Fi story will make you question yourself and the memories that might lurk beneath the shadows of your conscience.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: intel I5 5200u Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 940M Storage: 1 GB available space
